Store Views¶

apps.store.views.category_detail(request, slug)¶

Renders specific details of a category Params:

-slug:[String] A specified id-like of a category

Return:

-[Render]: Renders the category_detail.html according to the category has been defined into the slug variable

apps.store.views.product_detail(request, category_slug, slug)¶

Return details about a specific product according to a request Params:

  • category_slug:[String] A specific ID-like string for a specific category

  • slug: [String] A specific ID-like string for a specific product

Return:

-[Render]: Return a product_detail.html containing information about a specific product

apps.store.views.search(request)¶

A search ability to find products by providing a string. The user’s provided string is filtered in the database. The search is triggered in title and the description Return:

-[Render] Renders the search.html containing the results

apps.store.views.store_detail(request, slug)¶

Renders the details of a specific store using as a parameter the slug (stringify id) Params:

-slug:[String] A string-like id

Return:

-[Render] Renders the store_detail.html
